abstracts.cdata!:
The extensive damage to physical assets
            as a result of years of civil strife, and equally grave
            social conditions in the country, led the government to
            redress this situation, by embarking upon a National
            Emergency Reconstruction Program, of which this project is
            part of. Nonetheless, the Government's inability to
            provide, in the absence of parliamentary ratification, the
            requisite legal opinion with respect to the Project's
            legal documents, the Loan Agreement and the Project
            Agreement between the Council for Development and
            Reconstruction, and the Bank, dated September 12, 1997,
            conduced to the termination of such agreements, effective
            August 3, 1998.
